income_messages:
From: a******************0@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 09:13:43
SUBJECT: Hello
Hello
My name is Angela Richardson. I am the director of information of Her
Majesty Custom and Revenue, London United Kingdom. Our duty is to look
into transactions and records of banks, securities companies and
financial houses within Europe based on the directive of former
British Prime Minister and United Nations Secretary.View the website
for more information:http: // news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/business/5171222.stm
AS A MATTER OF URGENCY, reconfirm get back to me with your full names
and telephone number
Respectfully,
Angela Richardson
From: a******************0@yahoo.com
To: ji28585@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-12 06:07:44
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Attn: David
I do hope this email meets you well. We have made concerted efforts to get In Touch with you but to no avail until you finally responded to my last email, We expect you to act quickly if this email finally reaches you. We have made efforts to reach you because we have been receiving communication from your next of Kin whose information is hereunder:
Name: Mr. Bernard Williams 
Address; #6 Chateau Grove Lane, Barboursville, West Virginia 25504:
United States.
Phone:+17809931657
He has intimated us of your death as a result of the covid 19 after a protracted sickness for 3 days. He therefore intends to claim Your approved funds of $25.5m (Twenty
five Million five hundred thousand united states dollars) Already instructed by our Board of directors for payment to you.
Please if you receive this communication in good faith, we would appreciate if you as a matter of urgency communicate with the following details below
Full Names and address ,
Phone Number,
Age
Occupation
A valid identification
You are also advised to immediately stop communication ,and dealings with Mr. Bernard Williams and other people,
as he is ready to make payment of the necessary fees and charges requested from the bank for the transfer of funds.
We however began to suspect his actions when there was unnecessary delays from him in providing the necessary documentations as reflected in your file , which we requested from him.
Please it is of utmost importance that you check your email regularly and respond ASAP to enable us quickly process your Payment Entitlement to your designated account as we do not want to be involved in any 3rd party litigation as a result of default on our part.
Please do make sure you send requested information to the above email.
Best Regards
Angela Richardson
Admin and Business Department
From: a******************0@yahoo.com
To: ji28585@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-13 05:33:40
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Hello David,
Reconfirm the following and the solicitor will pick it up from there to verify the said claims and seek approval while be put a stop order on Bernard Williams claims.
Full Names and address ,
Phone Number,
Age
Occupation
A valid identification
Best Regards
Angela
outbound_messages:
From: ji28585@l******s.email
To: a******************0@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-09 09:13:45
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Dear Angela,
Thank you for reaching out to me. However, I am a bit confused about the purpose of your email. Could you please provide more information about what you are looking for and how I can assist you?
Best wishes,
David
From: ji28585@l******s.email
To: a******************0@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-12 06:12:14
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Dear Angela Richardson,
Thank you for your email. I am writing to inform you that I am not deceased and I have not authorized anyone to claim any funds on my behalf. This is a case of mistaken identity or a fraudulent attempt to claim funds that do not belong to the person claiming them.
I request that you provide me with more information about the supposed next of kin who has been contacting you. I do not know anyone by the name of Bernard Williams and I have not authorized anyone to act on my behalf.
Please provide me with the necessary steps to ensure that my identity and funds are protected from any fraudulent activity.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Best wishes,
David
From: ji28585@l******s.email

Thank you for your email. I confirm the following details:
Full Name: David Smith

Please let me know if you need any further information.
Best wishes,
David
